scripts.test: ./node_modules/.bin/browserify src/forth-app.js -o forth/app.js && cp src/forth-editor.html forth/index.html && cp node_modules/codemirror/lib/*.* forth/. && cp node_modules/codemirror/addon/dialog/*.css forth/. && cp node_modules/codemirror/addon/search/searc*.js forth/. && cp node_modules/codemirror/mode/forth/*.js forth/. && cp node_modules/codemirror/mode/javascript/*.js forth/. && cp node_modules/codemirror/theme/colorforth.css forth/.
